General.Name: Sunview Group Bhd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Sunview Group Berhad, through its subsidiaries, engages in the engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning, and installation of solar photovoltaic (PV) facilities in Malaysia. The company also involved in the solar power generation and supply business. In addition, it provides solar PV engineering services; and supplies solar PV equipment and ancillary systems. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
